Saying yes to flexibility makes it possible to achieve very high production levels, of up to 280,000 vehicles per year, and also open the way for the potential creation of jobs, Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. ''In a country such as Italy, which has always been tied to the past and reluctant to change... those who voted yes showed vision,'' he said.
